review: What can I say, I love Chrome cast, I cast every video that I like to my TV with out any problem.

review: got this for my parents they love it.

review: We use this all the time - great way to get things from your phone/tablet/laptop to your TV for all to view.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love this. Easy to use with tablet, phone and laptop. View tiny photos on your TV. Watch YouTube videos. Easy to set up and use
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy setup and works perfectly.  Not much content yet, though.
author: M. Williams "Mike"

review: This "just works" better than any tech device I've bought in the last decade. I buy a lot of this stuff and know exactly what I am doing, so that says a lot! Huge bang for the buck with the Chromecast... being able to play Cards Against Humanity and all the expansions is just icing on the cake!
author: Joe

review: Exactly what I needed. Item arrived super fast and the product is amazing. Highly recommend seller
author: Joseph Flener
